name: Wrapped Ether
description: Wrapped Ether (WETH) is a token that represents Ether (ETH) on the Ethereum blockchain and is designed to facilitate seamless transactions and interactions with decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts. Created to maintain compatibility with ERC-20 token standards, WETH allows users to trade Ether in environments that require it to be in the ERC-20 format. This functionality is crucial as many decentralized exchanges (DEXs) and DeFi protocols are built on the Ethereum network and require all assets to conform to the ERC-20 standard. WETH is pegged 1:1 with Ether, meaning that for every WETH token in circulation, there is an equivalent amount of Ether held in reserve. The wrapping process is straightforward; users can convert their ETH to WETH and vice versa through various platforms or smart contracts. The utility of WETH extends beyond trading; it is extensively used in various DeFi protocols for lending, borrowing, and liquidity provision. As the Ethereum ecosystem continues to grow, WETH plays a vital role in enhancing liquidity and enabling diverse financial applications, ultimately contributing to the development of a more decentralized finance landscape.

seo.meta_title: Wrapped Ether (WETH) | The ERC-20 Token for Ether
seo.meta_description: Learn about Wrapped Ether (WETH), a crucial token for trading and interacting with Ethereum-based decentralized applications. Discover its features and utility in the DeFi space.

faq.question: What is Wrapped Ether?
faq.answer: Wrapped Ether (WETH) is an ERC-20 token that represents Ether (ETH) on the Ethereum blockchain, allowing for compatibility with decentralized applications.

faq.question: How is WETH different from ETH?
faq.answer: WETH is an ERC-20 token that can be used in various DeFi applications, while ETH is the native currency of the Ethereum network.

faq.question: How can I convert ETH to WETH?
faq.answer: You can convert ETH to WETH through various platforms or smart contracts that facilitate the wrapping process.

faq.question: What can I do with WETH?
faq.answer: WETH can be used for trading, lending, borrowing, and providing liquidity in decentralized finance applications.

faq.question: Is WETH backed by ETH?
faq.answer: Yes, WETH is pegged 1:1 with ETH, meaning every WETH token is backed by an equivalent amount of Ether.
